nodes.text: A Jedi seeker was a Jedi that searched the galaxy for Force-sensitive younglings to recruit into the Jedi Order. The Jedi Masters Yula Braylon, Cherff Maota, and Yoda were seekers. Jedi Knight Cere Junda was a seeker prior to the fall of the Jedi, telling Captain Greez Dritus of her past during the secret mission to rebuild the Jedi Order. Upon learning of the seekers, Dritus decided he was effectively a seeker as well because he was helping her.
